verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> a thing <S%H1697><s%> was revealed <S%H1540><s%> to Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Belteshazzar; <S%H1095><s%> and the thing <S%H1697><s%> was true, <S%H571><s%> but the time appointed <S%H6635><s%> was long: <S%H1419><s%> and he understood <S%H995><s%> the thing, <S%H1697><s%> and had understanding <S%H998><s%> of the vision. <S%H4758><s%>
In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> was mourning <S%H56><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> full <S%H3117><s%> weeks. <S%H7620><s%>

I ate <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> pleasant <S%H2530><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> came <S%H935><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did I anoint <S%H5480><s%> myself at all, till <S%H5704><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> whole <S%H3117><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> were fulfilled. <S%H4390><s%>

And in the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> as I was by the side <S%H3027><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Hiddekel; <S%H2313><s%>

Then I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> whose loins <S%H4975><s%> were girded <S%H2296><s%> with fine gold <S%H3800><s%> of Uphaz: <S%H210><s%>

His body <S%H1472><s%> also was like the beryl, <S%H8658><s%> and his face <S%H6440><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of lightning, <S%H1300><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> as lamps <S%H3940><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> and his arms <S%H2220><s%> and his feet <S%H4772><s%> like in color <S%H5869><s%> to polished <S%H7044><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%> like the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a multitude. <S%H1995><s%>

And I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the vision: <S%H4759><s%> for the men <S%H582><s%> that were with me saw <S%H7200><s%> not the vision; <S%H4759><s%> but a great <S%H1419><s%> quaking <S%H2731><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on them, so that they fled <S%H1272><s%> to hide <S%H2244><s%> themselves.

Therefore I was left <S%H7604><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> vision, <S%H4759><s%> and there remained <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> in me: for my comeliness <S%H1935><s%> was turned <S%H2015><s%> in me into corruption, <S%H4889><s%> and I retained <S%H6113><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>

Yet heard <S%H8085><s%> I the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words: <S%H1697><s%> and when I heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words, <S%H1697><s%> then was I in a deep <S%H7290><s%> sleep <S%H7290><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> and my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground. <S%H776><s%>
And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> an hand <S%H3027><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> me, which set <S%H5128><s%> me on my knees <S%H1290><s%> and on the palms <S%H3709><s%> of my hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, O Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved, <S%H2530><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that I speak <S%H1696><s%> to you, and stand <S%H5975><s%> upright: <S%H5977><s%> for to you am I now <S%H6258><s%> sent. <S%H7971><s%> And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> to me, I stood <S%H5975><s%> trembling. <S%H7460><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he to me, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not, Daniel: <S%H1840><s%> for from the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that you did set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> to understand, <S%H995><s%> and to chasten <S%H6031><s%> yourself before <S%H6440><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> were heard, <S%H8085><s%> and I am come <S%H935><s%> for your words. <S%H1697><s%>

But the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> withstood <S%H5975><s%> me one <S%H259><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> but, see, <S%H2009><s%> Michael, <S%H4317><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the chief <S%H7223><s%> princes, <S%H8269><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> me; and I remained <S%H3498><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Persia. <S%H6539><s%>

Now I am come <S%H935><s%> to make you understand <S%H995><s%> what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall befall <S%H7136><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> for yet <S%H5750><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%> is for many days. <S%H3117><s%>

And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> such <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> to me, I set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground, <S%H776><s%> and I became <S%H481><s%> dumb. <S%H481><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> one like the similitude <S%H1823><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> my lips: <S%H8193><s%> then I opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and spoke, <S%H1696><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him that stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me, O my lord, <S%H113><s%> by the vision <S%H4758><s%> my sorrows <S%H6735><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> on me, and I have retained <S%H6113><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>

For how <S%H1963><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> with this <S%H2088><s%> my lord? <S%H113><s%> for as for me, straightway <S%H6258><s%> there remained <S%H5975><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> in me, neither <S%H3808><s%> is there breath <S%H5397><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> in me.
Then there came again <S%H3254><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> me one like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> and he strengthened <S%H2388><s%> me,

And said, <S%H559><s%> O man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved, <S%H2530><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not: peace <S%H7965><s%> be to you, be strong, <S%H2388><s%> yes, be strong. <S%H2388><s%> And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to me, I was strengthened, <S%H2388><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Let my lord <S%H113><s%> speak; <S%H1696><s%> for you have strengthened <S%H2388><s%> me.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he, Know <S%H3045><s%> you why <S%H4100><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> to you? and now <S%H6258><s%> will I return <S%H7725><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Persia: <S%H6539><s%> and when I am gone <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> see, <S%H2009><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Grecia <S%H3120><s%> shall come. <S%H935><s%>

But I will show <S%H5046><s%> you that which is noted <S%H7559><s%> in the scripture <S%H3791><s%> of truth: <S%H571><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> that holds <S%H2388><s%> with me in these <S%H428><s%> things, but Michael <S%H4317><s%> your prince. <S%H8269><s%>
